last_episode_to_air.name: Toy Hoggers
last_episode_to_air.overview: King Pig throws off his old teddy, but worries about it and wants it back, and Terence now had it.

name: Angry Birds Toons
overview: Angry Birds Toons tells how life is not always easy on Piggie Island. Red and angry feathered companions, Chuck, Mathilda, Bomb, Blues and Terence must come together to protect their eggs - and future - of cunning plots of Bad Piggies. Having only guides for their intelligence and determination, they absolutely must thwart the advanced technology Piggies are also incredibly too many. Nevertheless, they have a huge advantage ... the incredible stupidity of the Piggies! Angry Birds Toon gives life to characters and adventures of one of the most popular games in history and presents the amusing world, and cunning of Birds and their sworn enemies, the Piggies.

episodes.name: Chuck Time
episodes.overview: When Chuck accidentally knocks Red off a precipice, the race is on to save him before he hits rock bottom.

episodes.name: Where's My Crown?
episodes.overview: When King Pig loses his crown, he finds out what it's like to be at the bottom of the pile for a change.

episodes.name: Full Metal Chuck
episodes.overview: Chuck forces the Blues to exercise by an obstacle course, But the Blues beat the obstacle course.

episodes.name: Another Birthday
episodes.overview: One of the Minion Pigs has a birthday, but none of the other pigs want to celebrate with him as they go along with their routine work. But at the end of the day, they give him a surprise party.

episodes.name: Egg Sounds
episodes.overview: The Blues trick Red into thinking that the eggs are chirping. Matilda and Chuck think they could influence the eggs' behavior by making their own sounds which the eggs seem to imitate. A quarrel starts between them and the argument escalates until they realize they have been tricked.

episodes.name: Pig Talent
episodes.overview: It's talent show time in Pig City, but with King Pig as judge the contestants have a lot to be nervous about.

episodes.name: Cordon Bleugh!
episodes.overview: Matilda's new soup turns out to be horrible. Meanwhile, the Corporal and Minion Pigs try to scale the cliff side to steal the eggs.

episodes.name: True Blue?
episodes.overview: One of the pigs disguises as a bird to mingle with the Blues and try to steal the eggs. But the Blues are not fooled, and put the pig through a series of stunts.

episodes.name: Do As I Say!
episodes.overview: Matilda gets angry as the Blues play dangerous games with the eggs. But when the eggs are in trouble, she goes against her own ideas.

episodes.name: Off Duty
episodes.overview: While Red's away, the other Birds think it's their chance to play...

episodes.name: Slingshot 101
episodes.overview: Red teaches the Blues a lesson when he finds them messing around with the Slingshot, but he soon finds the boot on the other foot.

episodes.name: Thunder Chuck
episodes.overview: Chuck is on guard duty during a heavy storm, but doesn't want Red to find out that he's scared of lightning.

episodes.name: Gardening with Terence
episodes.overview: Terence casts an ominous shadow over Matilda's flower beds.

episodes.name: Dopeys on a Rope
episodes.overview: The Pigs plan a sneak attack from above, but the Blues soon take the bounce out of their bungee.

episodes.name: Trojan Egg
episodes.overview: King Pig launches a sneak attack on the eggs.

episodes.name: Double Take
episodes.overview: The Blues disguise themselves as eggs for fun. The pigs kidnap the birds thinking they are the real eggs, and then other pigs go into the nest pretending to be eggs as well.

episodes.name: Crash Test Piggies
episodes.overview: Moustache Pig tries out his latest weapon of mass destruction on some very worried Minion Pigs.

episodes.name: Slappy-Go-Lucky
episodes.overview: Professor Pig's latest invention turns out to be far from relaxing when Moustache Pig gets his trotters on the plans.

episodes.name: Sneezy Does It
episodes.overview: During a celebration, one of the party pigs causes the entourage to fall. The king has the pig who slipped up launched away and replaces it with the party pig. After climbing the stairs, the party pig is bothered by a bee.

episodes.name: Run Chuck Run
episodes.overview: The Birds are fed up with speedster Chuck winning every race, so they release their secret weapon,Terrence!

episodes.name: Hypno Pigs
episodes.overview: The Pigs resort to hypnosis to get the Eggs, but with Red out for the count, they can't resist a bit of fun...

episodes.name: Eggs' Day Out
episodes.overview: A stray egg finds its way into Pig City.

episodes.name: Gate Crasher
episodes.overview: The Pigs finally capture the Eggs, but Chuck is determined to get through the gates of Pig City, even if it means using his head.

episodes.name: Hog Roast
episodes.overview: One thing's sure in Pig City, when you call the emergency services, the emergency is about to get a lot worse...

episodes.name: The Bird That Cried Pig
episodes.overview: Chuck is annoyed that Bomb always gets the credit for saving the Eggs. So Chuck comes up with a plan to become the hero of the day, but unfortunately it goes terribly wrong!

episodes.name: Hamshank Redemption
episodes.overview: A prisoner pig tries to escape from his cell with all kinds of crazy attempts.

episodes.name: Green Pig Soup
episodes.overview: The pigs try to approach the eggs in Matilda's garden by disguising themselves as cabbages.

episodes.name: Catch Of The Day
episodes.overview: Corporal Pig and his Minion Pigs in the ship tried to steal the eggs with the use of a plunger, but in return, useless things are caught.

episodes.name: Nighty Night Terence
episodes.overview: The Pigs tried to sleep Terence from being guarding the eggs or awakening to steal the eggs with their plans, but they had an unexpectedly fall.

episodes.name: Piggy Wig
episodes.overview: King tries to find the perfect wig when one of the Blues lands on his head. King thinks that one is the perfect wig.

episodes.name: Pig Plot Potion
episodes.overview: Chef makes a potion that turns creatures into obedient piggy minions. Chef tries it on Red but the effects wear off.

episodes.name: Tooth Royal
episodes.overview: King has a toothache, where the solution is to pull out the tooth, but the task is harder than it looks.

episodes.name: Night of the Living Pork
episodes.overview: King receives a visit from trick-o-treaters who turn out to be zombie piggies. And Bubbles is also invited.

episodes.name: King Of The Castle
episodes.overview: Chef Pig and King Pig engage in a crazy sandcastle competition. Who will win?

episodes.name: Love Is In The Air
episodes.overview: A cabbage falls on King Pig's head. He falls in love with it. The minion pigs find it very cute, but Corporal Pig's dismayed. Will he manage to make him come back to his senses?

episodes.name: Fired Up
episodes.overview: Chuck's idea of keeping the eggs warm is rejected, and Red uses Matilda's blanket instead. Chuck uses a magnifying glass to try to heat the eggs but the blanket catches fire.

episodes.name: Clash of Corns
episodes.overview: Bomb wants to eat Matilda's only corn plant that she's not happy about this and will do everything she can to stop him. But does this include giving up her principles of peace?

episodes.name: A Pig's Best Friend
episodes.overview: King has captured one of the Blues as a pet, but the Blue is harder to care for than he thinks.

episodes.name: Slumber Mill
episodes.overview: A minion pig who cuts lumber is surprised to find his home is now under a highly travelled road.

episodes.name: Jingle Yells
episodes.overview: Corporal pig dresses as Santa in order to steal the eggs, but the Blues discover his disguise. Later they get gifts from the real Santa.

episodes.name: El Porkador!
episodes.overview: A big pig dressed in a luchador costume outmuscles the birds, until he meets Terence.

episodes.name: Hiccups
episodes.overview: The Blues get the hiccups, which at first seemed cute, but it gets annoying and disrupts their sleep. The birds try different methods to try to stop the hiccups.

episodes.name: The Butterfly Effect
episodes.overview: Matilda is admiring a butterfly. The pigs have the idea to create a replica butterfly to distract Matilda from the nest.

episodes.name: Hambo
episodes.overview: A minion pig takes his boot camp training too seriously and is tasked to retrieve the eggs.

episodes.name: Bird Flu
episodes.overview: The birds come down with some kind of flu. The pigs steal the eggs and bring them to the king, but later catch the illness as well.

episodes.name: Piggies From The Deep
episodes.overview: Two minion pigs dress up in shark fins and scare Foreman Pig, then did the same at the public pool. Foreman Pig tries to get revenge by putting on a shark costume, but it backfires.

episodes.name: Oh, Gnome!
episodes.overview: Chuck presents Matilda with a creepy mechanical garden gnome statue. Matilda feels uneasy and struggles to get rid of it, but feels guilty about hurting Chuck's feelings.

episodes.name: Shrub It In
episodes.overview: Bomb and the Blues accidentally destroy Matilda's only rose bush. Bomb finds a replacement bush while the Blues try to distract Matilda with some magic tricks.

episodes.name: The Truce
episodes.overview: Chef Pig pretends to make a truce with the birds by cooking them a meal and distracting them from guarding the eggs. He laces the cupcakes with sleeping formula, but it backfires, and the birds catch the other pigs stealing the eggs.

episodes.name: Operation Opera
episodes.overview: The pigs create a mechanical opera-singing bird to woo Matilda away from the nest.

episodes.name: Chucked Out
episodes.overview: Chuck's karate-chopping shenanigans cause a mess with the other birds, so he exiles himself.

episodes.name: Bomb's Awake
episodes.overview: The Blues notice that Bomb has been sleepwalking and make fun of him. But when Bomb takes the eggs along in his walk, the Blues try to save them from danger.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: X marks the spot! King Pig sends his best pigs to retrieve a buried treasure. Of course when pigs are involved, nothing is that simple.

episodes.name: Sweets of Doom
episodes.overview: No one gets between Bubbles and his candy. Not even King Pig! But there's something fishy about these sweets.

episodes.name: Party Ahoy
episodes.overview: A massive pig party is raging on a remote island, but King Pig has been left behind! Luckily, Foreman Pig is there to help! Well, maybe luck isn't the right word...

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Little known fact, Chuck is a hide-and-seek champion. However, sometimes his hiding spots can be a bit TOO good.

episodes.name: Sink or Swim
episodes.overview: It's about time for Red to learn how to swim, but he's too stubborn to accept help from his friends! Can he overcome his pride and channel his inner waterfowl?

episodes.name: Super Bomb!
episodes.overview: Bomb to the rescue! Bomb's love for classic superheroes inspires a new wardrobe choice, and a need to save everything on Piggy Island! But every superhero has a weakness…

episodes.name: Just So
episodes.overview: All Red wants is for the eggs to have a perfect environment where they can incubate in peace. Is that too much to ask?

episodes.name: The Miracle of Life
episodes.overview: The pigs kidnap Red and Chuck and force them to make an egg. –Wait, what? They really can’t be that dumb can they? Don’t answer that...

episodes.name: Cave Pig
episodes.overview: The pigs discover a perfectly preserved Cave Pig in a block of ice. Absolutely nothing bad will happen if they keep it at room temperature right?

episodes.name: Joy to the Pigs
episodes.overview: He knows when you are sleeping. He knows when you're awake. He knows if you've been bad or good - SO BE GOOD FOR GOODNESS SAKE!

episodes.name: Dogzilla
episodes.overview: Pig City is being attacked by a fearsome hairy beast! Sound the alarm! Secure the perimeter! Get the toilet paper! You know we need it!

episodes.name: Boulder Bro
episodes.overview: The other birds grow tired of Chuck's attention-seeking. That's ok. Chuck will just make a new friend!

episodes.name: Chuckmania
episodes.overview: Moustache pig puts together an egg-napping plan. Let's distract the most charismatic bird on Piggy Island by stroking his ego.

episodes.name: Not Without My Helmet
episodes.overview: Some of us wear many hats every day. For Corporal Pig, it's just the one. Hog of war. Destroyer of birds. But what what's left when you strip away his defining accessory?

episodes.name: Mona Litha
episodes.overview: One of Chuck's friends sets him up on a hot date. The table's set, and the candles are lit for a romantic evening.

episodes.name: Sir Bomb of Hamelot
episodes.overview: Bomb joins in the Medieval Fair festivities in Pig City by entering the joust competition. But is the prize really worth fighting for?

episodes.name: Bearded Ambition
episodes.overview: King Pig envies the noble bearded visages of the piggy elders, but narry a single whisker sprouts from his baby smooth face. What's a pig to do?

episodes.name: Cold Justice
episodes.overview: Matilda has a guilty pleasure: pig hockey. She's such a superfan, she even dreams of joining the game herself! There's just one problem – she's not a pig.

episodes.name: Slow the Chuck Down!
episodes.overview: Matilda thinks Chuck should slow down and enjoy the finer things in life. Then again, blazing speed does come in handy from time to time.

episodes.name: Brutal vs. Brutal
episodes.overview: A misunderstanding over some misplaced nunchucks leads to a grudge match between Chuck and the toughest pig on Piggy Island. Let's get ready to rumble!

episodes.name: Eating Out
episodes.overview: While Matilda's out at the beach, the birds are left to fend for themselves for dinner, but their culinary muscles are... not as developed as they could be.

episodes.name: The Great Eggscape
episodes.overview: King Pig finally gets an honest to gonest egg within chomping range when Red shows up and threatens to shatter his omelette-eating dreams. Time to skedaddle!

episodes.name: Sleep Like a Hog
episodes.overview: King Pig can't sleep, and it's up to Professor Pig to get him to saw some logs. He's got science on his side! But if that doesn't work, they can always put him down 'maunually'...

episodes.name: Bombina
episodes.overview: Being a highly explosive bird, Bomb is a huge threat to the pigs. Maybe they can lead him away from the eggs by his heartstrings...

episodes.name: Pig Possessed
episodes.overview: King Pig is on a wild eating spree when he happens upon (i.e. devours entirely) the tent of a witch doctor.

episodes.name: Epic Sax-Off!
episodes.overview: Matilda finds a spot to practice her saxophone away from the complaints of the other birds, but she's soon upstaged by a slick piggy horn player. There's only one way to settle this – BATTLE OF THE SAXES!

episodes.name: Royal Heist
episodes.overview: King Pig rescues a mistreated egg. After all, these things aren’t exactly a dime-a-dozen! Are they?

episodes.name: Bad Hair Day
episodes.overview: Chuck finds a grey feather in his plumage and is forced to cope with the fact that he is no longer a spring chicken.

episodes.name: Golditrotters
episodes.overview: This little pig is too tough for a dumb children’s book. Golditrotters? Pshhhhhh – that’s not scary.

episodes.name: A Fistful of Cabbage
episodes.overview: Look out pigs. There’s a new sheriff in town, and he is taking absolutely no guff from these swine.

episodes.name: Porcula
episodes.overview: On one night every year, the dreaded Porcula comes out to feast, but he should really pay more attention to what he eats.

episodes.name: Didgeridork
episodes.overview: In this world, there are didgeridoos and didgeridon'ts – a lesson that Chuck had to learn the hard way.

episodes.name: The Porktrait
episodes.overview: Admiring the portraits of past leaders, King Pig tries to take the perfect snapshot to inspire admiration in all pig kind. Tries.

episodes.name: Fix It!
episodes.overview: When it comes to breaking things, Chuck is a superstar. When it comes to fixing them, results vary.

episodes.name: Age Rage
episodes.overview: Professor Pig completely fails at making a youth serum, but every failure is a new opportunity – to weaponize!

episodes.name: Catching The Blues
episodes.overview: Mustache Pig seizes the perfect opportunity to catch that one blue bird. There’s no escaping now!

episodes.name: Last Tree Standing
episodes.overview: Oh, Christmas tree. OH! THE CHRISTMAS TREE!!!

episodes.name: Happy Hippy
episodes.overview: When the pigs are constantly ruffling Red's feathers, it takes a special kind of bird to calm his inner beast.

episodes.name: Mind the Pony
episodes.overview: Chuck and Bomb go for a rescue mission in the heart of Pig City, but when the dust settles who is left to clean up?

episodes.name: Robo-tilda
episodes.overview: Can the pigs get away with secretly replacing Matilda with a robot look-alike? Surely not – for very long.

episodes.name: King of the Ring
episodes.overview: King Pig wanted to fight in a wrestler match, only to get his wrestler figurine.

episodes.name: Spaced Out
episodes.overview: The Blues pranked Chuck as there were aliens. But Chuck managed to defeat them.

episodes.name: Battling Butlers
episodes.overview: The new teen butler was about to replace the King Pig's most trusted old butler. Who will be staying as the King Pig's butler?

episodes.name: Eggshaustion
episodes.overview: Chuck saws that the eggs got stolen, and Bomb's not looking at it. He rescued them, but finds out it was all a prank for piggies.

episodes.name: Short and Special
episodes.overview: Two piggies come to enjoy a ride. However, the guard at the entrance does not let the little one in. Later, they try few tricks to go together on the ride, but Goliath Pig keeps backfiring them.

episodes.name: Hocus Porcus
episodes.overview: When the magician accidentally makes King Pig disappear, he tries various tricks to get him back.

episodes.name: Romance in a Bottle
episodes.overview: Matilda and King Pig thought they are getting gifts in bottle from their dream love, but later known the truth in their mystery date.

episodes.name: The Butler Did It!
episodes.overview: King Pig wants to be a detective, but he was lacking in mystery solving skills.

episodes.name: Stalker
episodes.overview: The hotdog seller was after the King Pig, and King Pig was running away from him.

episodes.name: Photochucked
episodes.overview: There is already a Bomb in the flock, but when it comes to photobombs, Chuck is good at it.

episodes.name: Bake On!
episodes.overview: Chef Pig makes delicious cakes for King Pig, but he was shocked that the King liked the student pigs' ruined ones.

episodes.name: Toy Hoggers
episodes.overview: King Pig throws off his old teddy, but worries about it and wants it back, and Terence now had it.
